enhanced_description: HR Anexi, also known as Mentoria, serves as a comprehensive one-stop solution designed to empower HR professionals in leading organizational transformation, particularly for family-owned businesses. It offers a full spectrum of HR support, from aligning HR strategy with overarching business goals to detailed performance management, employee development, and rightsizing. The service provides actionable and scalable HR plans with a strong business-driven focus, fostering modern HR practices through a collaborative approach. Key offerings include managing organizational structure, compensation, and leveraging data-driven insights through employee surveys, talent assessments, and culture evaluations to identify training needs. HR Anexi also specializes in top talent acquisition, employing a proven process to identify and place high-performing leaders, ultimately ensuring businesses thrive with enhanced employee engagement and by unlocking their people's full potential.
